donor_name: JOINT UNITED NATIONS PROGRAMME ON HIV/AIDS
outputs.output_descr: Focus on creation,development and expansion of partnerships among all relevant players wighin China, and across all sectors of society including governments, NGOs,civil society,multilateral and bilateral agencies and the private sectors, strengthen the participation of communities and people, especially those affected by HIV/AIDS,tuberculosis and malaria,build on existing coordination mechanism and promote new and innovative partnerships where none exist.
